ygData.subject: RE: RE: Simply Charming...
ygData.msgSnippet: We are talking about different MOBs.  Correct my Efreeti to Reckless Efreet in Sol A.  His rare drop is an Obsidian Falmberge (2HS, War only, dam 20, del 50,
ygData.messageBody:
We are talking about different MOBs. Correct my Efreeti to Reckless Efreet
in Sol A. His rare drop is an Obsidian Falmberge (2HS, War only, dam 20,
del 50, Obsidian shatter, no drop) and a good portion of the warriors in my
clan seem to have one now :-).

There is no other Efreet or Efreeti in Sol A that I know of? Where is the
Efreeti that you speak of?

Taneran Dreamweaver
<Clan Jax>
Bard of the 31th song
Prexus

> > -----Original Message-----
> From: Greg Gillan [mailto:GGillan@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 10:40 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...
>
>
> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
> Efreeti is level 50. You have to get past a group of 6-8 imp
> protectors to
> get to him (level 45+ I think). Boots and ring seem to drop
> about the same
> amount.
>
>
> Elwyn Heartstring
> Level 50 Bard of Erollisi Marr
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: John_Senior@... [mailto:John_Senior@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 11:50 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...
>
>
> From: John_Senior@...
>
> How hard is the Efreeti to kill, where does he spawn. And how
> often does he
> drop those Boots?
> I've heard those Efreeti boots trade VERY highly - I've seen mithril or
> Ykesha's trade with that one.
>
> Madagan Songweaver - Bard of 30 songs - Veeshan
>
>
> > Although I like charm, and I like being able to kill hill giants this
> way,
> > it really really sux in a party and is pretty darn boring after
> the first
> 2
> > or 3. I much prefer holding the bar room in Sol A, or going after the
> > Efreeti with a party of 6 to watching a couple of giants beat on each
> other.
> > Solo'ing in my opinion just isn't very much fun and it is just clearly
> > boring compared to the non-stop action of a good dungeon. Last weekend,
> we
> > did a Guild invasion of Sol A. We held a good portion of the dungeon
> with
> > two well balanced parties of 6. A bard and snarer (ranger or druid), a
> > greater healer (shaman or cleric) and good tanks in each party,
> excessive
> > use of lullaby, hymn, anthem. Now that was TRULY what this game is
> supposed
> > to be about!
> >
> > Taneran Dreamweaver
> > <Clan Jax>
> > Bard of the 31th song
> > Prexus
>
>
>
>
>
>
